commit message: Removed DS_FULL (it wasn't used)
Factored out some of the color logic for the clues
Removed an extra layer of complexity for count colors
Magnets: you can now mark clues as done
Fix oversize clipping rectangle (since density change).
Target API 22; update Studio droppings.
Fix the rest of #209: widget tinting in custom dialogs.
Use latest build tools.

Make settings more discoverable as a button on the chooser.

This replaces the chooser style toggle, which is now available in settings (only when accessed from chooser).

Thanks to Alex for the idea. :-)
Fix a few lint warnings.
Fix #257: warn when replacing an unfinished game.
Fix #268: ensure density multiplier is an integer.
Fix #265: use white vs grey for block boundaries vs other grid lines.
Give keyboard a coat of paint, to resemble 5.x keyboard rather than 2.x.

Fix #267: only change night mode after 2.1s of past-threshold.

We immediately use the first sensor value on app start or resume, but after that, a change must remain past the change-state threshold for 2100ms (modulo delays in reporting) to take effect.

This should prevent flickering.
Re 259fd2f, don't crash on non-chooser prefs screen!

Fix #269: toast briefly about night mode the first 3 times

(as long as the setting has not been changed).
Fix #270 (and #268 properly) - let density remain a float; fix blitters to cope.
Fix #272: inflate from layout every time, preserving attributes.
Bump version for a new beta.
Merge branch 'upstream'
Accept new docs updates.
